trans-unit.source: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.

The key difference between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
An <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified `Boolean`.
The `Boolean` to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified integer.
If `value` is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.
The `integer` to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Compares this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
An object to compare, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance is less than value.
Zero
This instance is equal to value.
A positive integer
This instance is greater than value.
-or-
value is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
The object to be compared.
`true` if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures to determine if they are equal.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.

Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
`true` if `Value` is `False`, otherwise `false`.
Indicates whether or not the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure is null.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> value of the structure is **Null**, otherwise `false`.
Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
`true` if `Value` is `True`, otherwise `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine if they are not equal.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.

Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.

Represents a value of one that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.One> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
Performs a ones complement operation on the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The one's complement of the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
If the `Boolean` contains a null value the result also is a null value.
Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.And%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Computes the bitwise OR of its two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> operands.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Or%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Compares two instances of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> for equality.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> parameters.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Xor%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The results of the bitwise XOR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Used to test the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine whether it is false.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsFalse?displayProperty=fullName>
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to be tested.
`true` if the supplied parameter <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is false; otherwise `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> for inequality.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.NotEquals%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a NOT operation on an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> on which the NOT operation is performed.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref><xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref> if argument was true, <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref> if argument was null, and <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref> otherwise.
Performs a one's complement operation on the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.OnesComplement%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The one's complement of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
Used to test the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine whether it is true.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsTrue?displayProperty=fullName>
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to be tested.
`true` if the supplied parameter <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is true; otherwise `false`.
Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result
Converts the specified <xref href="System.String"></xref> representation of a logical value to its <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> equivalent.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> to be converted.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure containing the parsed value.
Converts the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> to a string.
A string containing the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
If the value is null, the string contains a null value.

Represents a true value that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure's value.
This property is read-only.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref>; otherwise `false`.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The results of the logical XOR operation as shown in the following table.
Value of x
Value of y Result

Represents a value of zero that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Zero> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
